verbs.description: WASHINGTON DC — The Trump administration [V: is] moving to reverse Obama - era rules barring hunters on some public lands in Alaska from baiting brown bears with bacon and doughnuts and using spotlights to shoot mother black bears and cubs hibernating in their dens .

WASHINGTON DC — [ARG0: The Trump administration] is [V: moving] [ARG1: to reverse Obama - era rules barring hunters on some public lands in Alaska from baiting brown bears with bacon and doughnuts and using spotlights to shoot mother black bears and cubs hibernating in their dens] .

WASHINGTON DC — [ARG0: The Trump administration] is moving to [V: reverse] [ARG1: Obama - era rules barring hunters on some public lands in Alaska from baiting brown bears with bacon and doughnuts and using spotlights to shoot mother black bears and cubs hibernating in their dens] .

WASHINGTON DC — The Trump administration is moving to reverse [ARG0: Obama - era rules] [V: barring] [ARG1: hunters on some public lands in Alaska] [ARG2: from baiting brown bears with bacon and doughnuts and using spotlights to shoot mother black bears and cubs hibernating in their dens] .
